column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] is getting old, but [This.GetSheHe] wants to live until he is at least 60.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is getting older, but [This.GetSheHe] wants to live until he is at least 70.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is old, but [This.GetSheHe] wants to live until he is at least 80.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is a living legend, but [This.GetSheHe] wants to live until he is at least 90.
To walk a century on this earth. Alas! Tempus fugit...
